arts.ttl: Juventus vs AC Milan – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Two Italian football giants collide at the Allianz Stadium in Turin on Sunday as Juventus welcome AC Milan in what promises to be the standout fixture of matchday six in Serie A. arts.ttl: AC Milan XI vs Juventus – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: AC Milan travel to Turin for a top-of-the-table clash with Juventus in Serie A this Sunday. The two teams are in contention for the Scudetto after exhibiting perfectly balanced league form, with two wins each and four draws. arts.ttl: Sky: Milan’s predicted XI for Juventus clash – Tomori recovers just in time
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Massimiliano Allegri is now expected to make just one change to the starting eleven for Juventus-Milan, following the swift recovery of Fikayo Tomori. The Englishman was subbed off in the game against Napoli due to an injury, more specifically a minor adductor strain, and it seemed he would miss this weekend’s clash. However, he has […] The post Sky: Milan’s predicted XI for Juventus clash – Tomori recovers just in time appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Serie A preview: Juventus vs. AC Milan – Team news, opposition insight, stats and prediction
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller AC Milan and Juventus will battle it out on Sunday evening, with one side looking to extend a winning run, the other to bounce back. It has been a strong start to the season by Milan, with four wins in five games, and they are currently at the top of the standings. arts.ttl: Allegri confirms Athekame or Bartesaghi will start against Juve – choice is obvious
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Massimiliano Allegri confirmed earlier today that one of Zachary Athekame and Davide Bartesaghi will start on Milan’s left flank against Juventus tomorrow. After playing the same left wing-back in the first five league games, Allegri will be forced to make a change tomorrow as Pervis Estupinan is suspended.
